TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ObjectFlowControl/ForLoopControl extends System.Object

summary.span: 向 Visual Basic 编译器提供用于编译 循环的服务。

span.span: Provides services to the Visual Basic compiler for compiling loops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持 Visual Basic 编译器，不宜在代码中直接使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
